contextId.information: Paul is saying that he should regularly give thanks to God. AT: should often give thanks to God (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
contextId.quote: should always give thanks to God

contextId.information: Paul is emphasizing how often he prays for them. AT: we also pray regularly for you. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
contextId.quote: we also pray continually for you

contextId.information: This is an exaggeration, a hyperbole. AT: "we should continually give thanks" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hyperbole]])
